S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a vessel which provides a service such as a tug, anchor handler, survey or supply vessel

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: warship
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a vessel designed for the conduct of military operations

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: towed or pushed composite unit
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: either a tug and tow, or any combination of a tug providing propulsion to barges or vessels secured ahead or alongside

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: tug and tow
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a combination of tug(s) and non-powered tow(s)

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: light recreational
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A pleasure boat or watercraft, or an excursion vessel used for short cruises such as whale watching

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: semi-submersible offshore installation
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An installation which is designed to float at all times and which is normally anchored in position when deployed in the offshore gas and oil industry.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: jack-up exploration or project installation
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: An exploration or project installation with legs which can be raised and lowered. The legs are raised when the installation is repositioned. When stationary the legs are lowered to the sea floor and the working platform is raised clear of the sea surface

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: livestock carrier
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A vessel designed to carry large quantities of live animals.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: sport fishing
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: A vessel used in fishing for pleasure or competition.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Online function
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: code for function performed by the online resource
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: codeListType=open enumeration; encoding=other: [something]

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: download
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: online instructions for transferring data from one storage device or system to another. (ISO 19115:2014)

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: information
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: online information about the resource (ISO 19115:2014)

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: offlineAccess
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: online instructions for requesting the resource from the provider (ISO 19115:2014)

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: order
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: online order process for obtaining the resource (ISO 19115:2014).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: search
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: online search interface for seeking out information about the resource (ISO 19115:2014).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: completeMetadata
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: complete metadata provided (ISO 19115:2014).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: browseGraphic
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: browse graphic provided (ISO 19115:2014).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: upload
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: online resource upload capability provided (ISO 19115:2014).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: emailService
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: online email service provided (ISO 19115:2014)

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: browsing
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: online browsing provided (ISO 19115:2014)

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: fileAccess
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: online file access provided (ISO 19115:2014)

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Telecommunication service
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Classification of methods of communication over a distance by electrical, electronic, or electromagnetic means.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: codeListType=open enumeration; encoding=other: [something]

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: voice
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The transfer or exchange of information by using sounds that are being made by mouth and throat when speaking

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: facsimile
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a system of transmitting and reproducing graphic matter (as printing or still pictures) by means of signals sent over telephone lines

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: SMS
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Short Message Service, a form of text messaging communication on phones and mobile phones

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: data
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: facts or information used usually to calculate, analyze, or plan something

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: streamedData
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Streamed data is data that that is constantly received by and presented to an end-user while being delivered by a provider.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: telex
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: a system of communication in which messages are sent over long distances by using a telephone system and are printed by using a special machine (called a teletypewriter)

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: telegraph
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: an apparatus, system, or process for communication at a distance by electric transmission over wire

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: email
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Messages and other data exchanged between individuals using computers in a network.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Text justification
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The anchor point of a text string

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: left
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The anchor point is at the start of the text string.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: centred
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The anchor point is at the centre of the text string.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: right
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The anchor point is at the end of the text string.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Text type
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The attribute from which a text string is derived.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: (S-122) Remark: S-122 does not include light features and therefore listed value '2: light characteristic' is omitted from the S-122 application schema.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: feature name
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The attribute from which a text string is derived.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Bearing information
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: A bearing is the direction one object is from another object.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Contact address
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Direction or superscription of a letter, package, etc., specifying the name of the place to which it is directed, and optionally a contact person or organisation who should receive it. (Oxford English Dictionary, 2nd Ed., adapted).

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Feature name
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: The complex attribute provides the name of an entity, defines the national language of the name, and provides the option to display the name at various system display settings.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Fixed date range
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: The complex attribute describes single fixed period, as the date range between its sub-attributes.
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:remarks: the sub-attributes date start and date end must be encoded using 4 digits for the calendar year (YYYY) and, optionally, 2 digits for the month (MM) (e.g. April = 04) and 2 digits for the day (DD). When no specific month and/or day is required/known, the values are replaced with dashes (-).

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Frequency pair
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: A pair of frequencies for transmitting and receiving radio signals. The shore station transmits and receives on the frequencies indicated.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Graphic
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Pictorial information such as a photograph, sketch, or other graphic, optionally accompanied by descriptive information about the graphic and the location relative to its subject from which it was made.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Horizontal positional uncertainty
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: The best estimate of the accuracy of a position.
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:remarks: The expected input is the maximum of the two-dimensional error. The error is assumed to be positive and negative. The plus/minus character shall not be encoded.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Information
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: The complex attribute provides additional textual information that cannot be provided using other allowable attributes for the feature, and defines the language of the text string.
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:remarks: this complex attribute should be used, for example, to hold the information that is shown on paper charts by cautionary and explanatory notes.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Notice time
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Span of time, prior to the time the service is needed, for preparations to be made to fulfil the requirement.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Online resource
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Information about online sources from which a resource or data can be obtained.
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:remarks: The complex attribute describes the access to online resources according to ISO 19115.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Orientation
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: The angular distance measured from true north to the major axis of the feature.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Schedule by day of week
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: The nature and timings of a daily schedule by days of the week.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Periodic date range
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: The complex attribute describes the active period for a seasonal feature (e.g. a buoy), as the dates between its sub-attributes
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:remarks: The sub-attributes date start and date end should be encoded using 4 digits for the calendar year (YYYY), 2 digits for the month (MM) (for example April = 04) and 2 digits for the day (DD). When no specific year is required (that is, the feature is removed at the same time each year) the following two cases may be considered: - same day each year: ----MMDD - same month each year: ----MM-- This conforms to ISO 8601:2004.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Radiocommunications
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Detailed radiocommunications description with channels, frequencies, preferences and time schedules

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: RxN Code
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: A summary of the impact of the most common types of regulation, restriction, recommendation and nautical information on a vessel.
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:remarks: This attribute converts the subject, topic, and effects of regulations, etc., from plain text or natural language into a set of categories.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Source indication
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Information about the source document, publication, or reference from which object data or textual material included or referenced in a dataset are derived

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Survey date range
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: The complex attribute describes the period of the hydrographic survey, as the time between its sub-attributes.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Telecommunications
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: A means or channel of communicating at a distance by electrical or electromagnetic means such as telegraphy, telephony, or broadcasting.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Text content
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Textual material, or a pointer to a resource providing textual material. May be accompanied by basic information about its source and relationship to the source.
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:remarks: textContent is intended to allow text passages from other publications to be included in, or referenced by, instances of feature or information types. Exactly one of sub-attributes onlineResource or information must be completed in one instance of textContent. Product specifications may restrict the use or content of onlineResource for security. For example, a product specification may forbid populating onlineResource. Product specification authors must consider whether applications using the data product may be prevented from accessing off-system resources by security policies.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Time intervals by day of week
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Time intervals by days of the week

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Vessels measurements
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Terms and definitions specifically related to vessels

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The applicable RxN
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The applicable regulation, restriction, recommendation or nautical information

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Applies in location
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The location in which the information item applies

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Authority (reference)
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to an Authority object

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Authority service hours
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The authority for which service hours are given

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Contact details (reference)
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to an Contact Details object

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Control authority
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The controlling organization or authority for a geographically located service

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Controlled service
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The service controlled by an organisation or authority

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Defined for
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to a specific spatial type(s).

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Defines
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to an information type providing spatial quality information.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Identifies
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to a specific feature(s).

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Information provided for
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to a specific feature(s) for which further information is required.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Is applicable to
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The object or class of objects to which the regulation, restriction, recommendation, or nautical information applies

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The information
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: Information related to an organisation

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The marine protected area
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The marine protected area for which the authority is responsible

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The organisation
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The organisation to which information relates

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Partial working day
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The work hours for a non-standard workday

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Permission
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The permissions for a location

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Must be filed by
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The class (generally, qualifying vessels) which must file the report

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Positions
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to a specific cartographically positioned location for text.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Provides information
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to an object that provides more information about the referencing feature or information type.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Report for location
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The feature pertaining to a report
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:remarks: Encodable only as a generic association in 3.0.0 datasets as it is an information->feature link. Example: reference to a controlled area which requires a report to be filed upon entry and departure

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Report to
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The organisation or place to which a report is sent.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Responsible authority
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The responsible authority

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The RxN
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The regulation, restriction, recommendation, or nautical information

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Service Hours (reference)
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: Service hours for an authority ore service provider

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The service hours for a non-standard workday
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The usual service hours to which an exception applies

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The ship report
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The report to be filed by a vessel

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Traffic service report
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The report for a traffic service

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Vessel location
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The location to which the permission statement applies
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:remarks: Implementations must use between Applicability and PermissionType objects, not to feature instance. The PermissionType->feature link is via a generic inverse association

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Additional information
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: A feature association for the binding between at least one instance of a geo feature and an instance of an information type.
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:remarks: Role informationProvidedFor encodable only as a generic inverse association in feature objects in 3.0.0 datasets

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Associated RxN
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: Association between a geographic location and a regulation, restriction, recommendation, or nautical information
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:remarks: Role appliesInLocation encodable only as a generic inverse association in 3.0.0 datasets as it is an information->feature link

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Exceptional workday
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: Exception to the usual working day

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: InclusionType
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: Association class specifying the relationship between the subset of vessels described by an APPLIC data object and a regulation (restriction, recommendation, or nautical information).

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: PermissionType
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: Association class for associations describing whether the subsets of vessels determined by the ship characteristics specified in APPLIC may (or must, etc.) transit, enter, or use a feature.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Protected area authority
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: Authority responsible for a protected area.
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:remarks: There may be more than one such authority depending on how responsibilities are divided.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Reporting authority
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: The authority with which a report must be filed

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Reporting requirement
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: Association between types of reports and classes of vessels which must file report of the type described

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Service control
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: Association between a geographically located service and the organisation that controls it
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:remarks: This is an information association linking a location where a service is provided with an information type describing the provider. Contrast to serviceProvisionArea, which is a feature association linking the area served with another feature describing the provider. Role controlledService encodable only as a generic inverse association in 3.0.0 datasets as it is an information->feature link

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Spatial Association
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: An association for the binding between a spatial type and its spatial quality information.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Traffic service report
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: Association between traffic control service and reports required of vessels pertaining to that area
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:remarks: Role reptForLocation encodable only as a generic inverse association in 3.0.0 datasets as it is an information->feature link

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:name: Text association
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:definition: A feature association for the binding between a geo feature and the cartographically positioned location for text.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: InformationType
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Generalized information type which carries all the common attributes

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: AbstractRxN
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: An abstract superclass for information types that encode rules, recommendations, and general information in text or graphic form.
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:remarks: Subtypes of AbstractRxN carry the same attributes, but differ in the nature of information they encode. There are currently four such subtypes: Regulations, Restrictions, Recommendations, and NauticalInformation.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Applicability
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Describes the relationship between vessel characteristics and: (i) the applicability of an associated information object or feature to the vessel; or, (ii) the use of a facility, place, or service by the vessel; or, (iii) passage of the vessel through an area.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Authority
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: A person or organisation having political or administrative power and control.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Contact details
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: information on how to reach a person or organisation by postal, internet, telephone, telex and radio systems

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Nautical information
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Nautical information about a related area or facility.
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:remarks: The association ref and role are overloaded since the feature association to this object has the same name, but the informationType element distinguishes it. The info->feature association is not allowed in edition 3.0.0. As a result, the multiplicity of informationProvidedFor role must be 0 because an instance may be associated with either feature or information type.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Non-standard working day
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Days when many services are not available. Often days of festivity or recreation when normal working hours are limited, esp. a national or religious festival, etc.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Service Hours
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: The time when a service is available and known exceptions.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Ship Report
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Describes how a ship should report to a maritime authority, including when to report, what to report and whether the format conforms to the IMO standard.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Recommendations
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Recommendations for a related area or facility.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Regulations
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Regulations for a related area or facility.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Restrictions
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Restrictions for a related area or facility.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: FeatureType
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: Generalized feature type which carries all the common attributes

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Marine Protected Area
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: Any area of the intertidal or sub-tidal terrain, together with its overlying water and associated flora, fauna, historical and cultural features, which has been reserved by law or other effective means to protect part or all of the enclosed environment.
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:remarks: Permitted values for status should be reviewed, some are probably irrelevant to MPAs without wrecks, obstructions, or any navigation aids

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Restricted area navigational
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: A specified area of land or water designated by an appropriate authority within which access or navigation is restricted in accordance with certain specified conditions. A navigational restricted area is an area where the restrictions have a direct impact on the navigation of a vessel in the area.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Restricted area regulatory
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: A specified area of land or water designated by an appropriate authority within which access or navigation is restricted in accordance with certain specified conditions. A regulatory restricted area is an area where the restrictions have no direct impact on the navigation of a vessel in the area, but impact on the activities that can take place within the area.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Vessel Traffic Service Area
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: The area of any service implemented by a relevant authority primarily designed to improve safety and efficiency of traffic flow and the protection of the environment. It may range from simple information messages, to extensive organisation of the traffic involving national or regional schemes.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Data coverage
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: A geographical area that describes the coverage and extent of spatial types.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Quality of NonBathymetric Data
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: An area within which a uniform assessment of the quality of the non-bathymetric data exists

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Text Placement
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: The Text Placement feature is used in association with the Feature Name attribute or a light description to optimise text positioning in ECDIS.
